item.title: Error Help Appreciated PI 317
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

havent coded in a while and im just fixing summoning, when i log out with a familar, when i log back in i lose the familar and also cant respawn a familar. I am trying to make it so if you have a familar out you cannot logout.

This is my compiler error:-

src\server\model\players\Client.java:725: error: unexpected type if(System.currentTimeMillis() - logoutDelay > 10000 && h asNpc = false){ ^ required: variable found: value Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

This is my code:-

public void logout() { synchronized (this) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - logoutDelay > 10000 && hasNpc = false){ outStream.createFrame(109); properLogout = true; PlayerSave.saveGame(this); saveCharacter = true; } else { sendMessage("You must be out of combat before you do this."); } } }

Read full topic
